# Fast C++ RSA Implementation 

This is an implementation of the RSA Encryption/Decryption algorithm ,along with miller rabin primality test which is repeated four times
with four different prime witnesses 2,3,5 and 7

## Input Format

the user inputs two primes P and Q and e (the public key exponent) 
then he inputs one or more of the available queries ,the available queries are :

IsPPrime
IsQPrime
Print N
Print Phi
EncryptPublic=<"message to be encrypted">
EncryptPrivate=<"message to be decrypted">

Quit --> this terminates the program

### Test Cases
Test Case 1:
```
P=12369571528747655798110188786567180759626910465726920556567298659370399748072366507234899432827475865189642714067836207300153035059472237275816384410077871
Q=2065420353441994803054315079370635087865508423962173447811880044936318158815802774220405304957787464676771309034463560633713497474362222775683960029689473
E=65537
IsPPrime
Yes
IsQPrime
Yes
PrintN

PrintPhi

PrintD

EncryptPublic=<123456789>

EncryptPrivate=<>
123456789
Quit
```
